title: Tammy Hembrow flaunts her curves and abs at the Sistine Chapel
text:
Instagram model Tammy Hembrow wore a rare pair of trousers while visiting the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City on Friday with boyfriend Jahkoy Palmer.

The 25-year-old, who is best known for sporting barely-there G-string bikinis and tiny gym shorts, dressed in an unusually modest ensemble for their tip to the sacred destination.

However, Tammy's skin-tight newspaper print trousers and cropped turtle neck sweater may still have challenged the the chapel's recommended dress code.

Modest! Instagram model Tammy Hembrow, 25, (pictured) swapped her usual G-string bikini for a pair of trousers and a cropped turtleneck top while visiting the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City on Friday with boyfriend Jahkoy Palmer

Although Tammy covered her arms and shoulders, having her enviable abs on show would likely have raised eyebrows from many other visitors.

'Don't wear tops that are cropped or cut to show the midriff,' a travel blogger wrote under a recommended dress code in 2017.

'Vatican & Sistine chapel were something else... ohhh my,' gushed Tammy on Instagram while sharing several tourist snaps after leaving the chapel.

Tourist! Tammy also shared this snap of soaring painted ceilings during her sight-seeing adventure

Vacation time! The following day, Tammy explored Rome, Italy in a pair of super skinny jeans and white bustier top with ruffles alongside Jahkoy

The following day, Tammy explored Rome, Italy in a pair of super skinny jeans and white bustier top with ruffles alongside Jahkoy.

After Tammy shared a picture holding an ice cream, Jahkoy commented: 'Can't tell what I enjoyed more, the ice cream or licking it after you.'

Tammy and Canadian rapper Jahkoy jetted to Italy for fashion designer Philipp Plein's store opening in Rome last week.

International influencers! Tammy and rapper Jahkoy jetted to Italy for fashion designer Philipp Plein's store opening in Rome last week. Pictured: The couple in Canada in June

The couple have been dating since June, and have traveled around America, Australia, Canada and Italy together so far.

Tammy recently reached a major social media milestone by hitting 10 million followers on Instagram.
description: Instagram model Tammy Hembrow wore a rare pair of trousers while visiting the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City on Friday with boyfriend Jahkoy Palmer.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
